"A.D.2028/4/19/13:00": "Say, Xiera... This is probably because Aru was absorbed by Mother, right?"
"Yes... That's likely the case."
"Continuing our previous conversation, with both of your connections now weakened, what's now within Aru is mostly darker elements."
"If we assume that Mother is using Aru's power..."
"It wouldn't be strange for the darker aspect to come out strongly."
"The fusion of Ether and Aru's darker elements..."
"From their fusion, a new type of Phantom was born... ESC-A Darkers."
"Strangely, because we saw them in person, we ended up proving our theory was true."
"If they have the same properties as darkers, this could be really bad."
"There was a previous secret incident where darkers appeared on Earth. We dealt with it, alongside ARKS, but even just a few of them caused a lot of fuss."
"These monsters that infect everything, now becoming phantoms which endlessly appear... That's not something I like to think about."
"According to the combat datas, it seems that they're not entirely darkers yet,  but..."
"That means there's not much time to waste."
"Everything is getting so screwed up because of me... I have to get Aru back as soon as possible!"
"1. Don't get too worked up"
"2. Don't push yourself too hard"
"Uh... Did you hear that just now? No, no no, it was nothing!"
"It's not nothing, you idiot. Our current situation is because you tried to handle everything yourself. Nothing good will come of that."
"Face us firmly and just spill it. Stop keeping every little thing to yourself. I'm still your big brother, you know."
"...Thank you. <%me>, big bro."
"I mean, it's just so painful and frustrating, and everything up to now is just a storm self-loathing and disgust."
"But, I will never stop. I'm not going to lose anything ever again."
"While you have a strong heart, nothing will change if you continue to carry your burdens alone. You need to rely on others more."
"Hm, if only I had a reliable person to stand by my side..."
"Yes, if only..."
"But now, you're with me. Both of you, <%me> and big bro, so everything is okay."
"No... I guess I did have someone before. There was someone I could depend on, but I was too blind to see it."
"Isn't that right, Kohri?"
"You called, Hitsugi?"
"What?!"
"I've come to pick you up, Hitsugi."
"Now, are you going to see Mother with me? And be turned back to normal? This time, for sure."
"Kohri..."
"<%me>! Ever since you arrived, Hitsugi has been acting strange... Because of you!"
"If only you weren't here... Even now, Hitsugi would be by my side!"
